comment: Value of the multiplication operation of an opposite ring. Hypotheses eliminated by a suggestion of Stefan O'Rear, 30-Aug-2015. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
